name: winsome
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
attractive and pleasing, with simple qualities, sometimes like those a child has: Maria brought along her eldest daughter - a winsome girl with brown eyes and a ready smile.

Related word
winsomely
Add to word list
Add to word list
charming and attractive in a simple way: She opened her eyes and gave her mother a winsome smile.
